StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateO.cerComponentCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @O.cerComponentCode varchar(2), @Na.onalCallToService char(1) = NULL, --- @OCCR char(1) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN DECLARE @PreviousComponentCode varchar(2) SELECT @PreviousComponentCode = OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
IF @O.cerComponentCode != @PreviousComponentCode AND @PreviousComponentCode IS NOT NULL BEGIN --- update the O.cer Program History if the component code changes EXEC sp_UpdateO.cerProgramHistory @NWAID = @NWAID, @O.cerProgram = @PreviousComponentCode, @UserLogin = @UserLogin END
--- UPDATE THE NWA'S COMPONENT CODE UPDATE NWA SET OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = @O.cerComponentCode, NATIONAL_CALL_TO_SERVICE = @Na.onalCallToService, --- OCCR = @OCCR, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
END
